mpmToolbox.supplementary

Class RecentOpened

  • java.lang.Object
    • mpmToolbox.supplementary.RecentOpened

  • public class RecentOpened
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to keep track of recently opened files.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt
